title: Hampton National Historic Site: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit       Hampton offers a variety of experiences for its visitors. Monthly second Sunday programs, special events, and guided tours are available. So to is the chance to explore at your own pace and to discover the landscape and to experience its splendid design. Many aspects of American history are reflected at Hampton. Come and enjoy.   Follow us on Twitter @ HamptonNPS for daily tweets and live information about what is happening at Hampton.  We are now on Facebook @ Hampton National Historic Site. Become a fan today and keep up with park happenings, share a story, or post your pictures of Hampton. Want to see more photos of Hampton taken by staff and by park visitors? View and join our Flickr group @ Hampton National Historic Site
